subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The dump example shows how to dump the contents of a database in a diff-able format.

ol.li: Make sure that the Java executable is on your path.
Copy the schemacrawler.config.properties file into the dump example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
Start a command shell in the dump example directory.
Try modifying the schemacrawler.config.properties with regular expressions, logging, and so on.
Redirect the output of SchemaCrawler into a file, by running dump.cmd > file.txt.
